scripts.sw.insert: ./node_modules/.bin/cross-conf-env "./node_modules/.bin/replace" "(<!--<sw\s*\/>-->)" "<script>if ('serviceWorker' in navigator) { navigator.serviceWorker.register('service-worker.js').then(() => console.log('service worker installed')).catch(err => console.log('Error', err)); }</script>" www/index.html
scripts.config.theme: npm run config.theme:title && npm run config.theme:toolbar && npm run config.theme:color
scripts.config.theme:title: ./node_modules/.bin/cross-conf-env "./node_modules/.bin/replace" "(<ion-title\b[^>]*>)[^<>]*(</ion-title>)" "<ion-title>npm_package_config_name</ion-title>" src/app/layout/header/header.component.html
scripts.resources: ./node_modules/.bin/ionic resources && npm run resources.copy && npm run pwa.manifest && npm run config.theme
scripts.postpublish.prod: npm run sw.update && npm run sw.insert
scripts.publish.prod.exp: npm run resources && npm run build.prod.exp
scripts.postpublish.prod.exp: npm run sw.update && npm run sw.insert
scripts.postinstall: mkdir www & npm run cordova -- prepare & exit 0
scripts.start.cordova: npm run build && npm run cordova -- serve
scripts.ionic.fix: npm run ionic.fix1 && npm run ionic.fix2 && npm run ionic.fix3 && npm run ionic.fix4 && npm run ionic.fix5 && npm run ionic.fix6 && npm run ionic.fix7 && npm run ionic.fix8 && npm run ionic.fix9 && npm run ionic.fix10
scripts.start.ionic: npm run build && npm run ionic.serve
scripts.start.windows: npm run build && npm run cordova -- run windows
scripts.install.windows: npm run cordova -- platform rm windows & npm run cordova -- platform add windows
scripts.start.ubuntu: npm run build && npm run cordova -- run --device
scripts.install.ubuntu: npm run cordova -- platform rm ubuntu & npm run cordova -- platform add ubuntu --save
scripts.start.ios: npm run build && npm run cordova -- run ios
scripts.install.ios: npm run cordova -- platform rm ios & npm run cordova -- platform add ios
scripts.start.osx: npm run build && npm run cordova -- run
scripts.install.osx: npm run cordova -- platform rm osx & npm run cordova -- platform add osx --save
scripts.start.android: npm run build && npm run cordova -- run android
scripts.install.android: npm run cordova -- platform rm android & npm run cordova -- platform add android
scripts.start.browser: npm run build && npm run cordova -- run browser -- --port=5555
scripts.install.browser: npm run cordova -- platform rm browser & npm run cordova -- platform add browser --save
scripts.publish.prod.browser: npm run publish.prod && npm run install.browser && npm run cordova -- build browser --release
